content.raw: Thanks for figuring this out! Based on the above comments, I've added collision and visual geometries to all links which are fixed-joint parents of other links that have collision or visual geometries, and now i can use gzsdf/gazebo with our robot again.
content.html: Thanks for figuring this out! Based on the above comments, I've added collision and visual geometries to all links which are fixed-joint parents of other links that have collision or visual geometries, and now i can use gzsdf/gazebo with our robot again.
